feed.title: Hermosawave Photography
feed.subtitle: A series of daily landscape photographs by Daniel Sofer, over 16 years running.

entry.title: AVP Hermosa Beach Open
entry.content:
Geena Urango goes for the dig during the opening round of the professional AVP volleyball tournament, on the sand in Hermosa Beach.

Below left, Nicole Nourse serves; on the right, Bruno Amorim blocks a kill from Chris Vaughn.
entry.summary: Geena Urango goes for the dig during the opening round of the professional AVP volleyball tournament, on the sand in Hermosa Beach. Below left, Nicole Nourse serves; on the right, Bruno Amorim blocks a kill from Chris Vaughn.

entry.title: Sunset at Dodger Stadium
entry.content: Orange clouds light up the sky at Los Angeles Dodger Stadium, during a game between the Dodgers and the Angels.
entry.summary: Orange clouds light up the sky at Los Angeles Dodger Stadium, during a game between the Dodgers and the Angels.

entry.title: Summer Dream
entry.content: A vintage vibe on a warm summer day in Hermosa Beach.
entry.summary: A vintage vibe on a warm summer day in Hermosa Beach.

entry.title: Surfline
entry.content: Looking down at the surf washing up on the beach.
entry.summary: Looking down at the surf washing up on the beach.

entry.title: Sunset Over 8th St.
entry.content: Sunset of low clouds, flying over the 8th St. lifeguard tower this evening.
entry.summary: Sunset of low clouds, flying over the 8th St. lifeguard tower this evening.

entry.title: Sunset Session
entry.content: Surfer goes out north of the Manhattan Beach Pier at sunset.
entry.summary: Surfer goes out north of the Manhattan Beach Pier at sunset.

entry.title: Above the Fog
entry.content:
A big wall of low clouds rolled in as I was going out to shoot tonight; so I decided to try to get above the fog, near the top of Palos Verdes.

In this shot: you can see the sun descending into the clouds at left; Malaga Cove in the center, and Torrance Beach on the right side; with a layer of clouds covering most of the beach.
entry.summary: A big wall of low clouds rolled in as I was going out to shoot tonight; so I decided to try to get above the fog, near the top of Palos Verdes. In this shot: you can see the sun descending into the clouds at left; Malaga Cove in the center, and Torrance Beach on the right side; with a layer of clouds covering most of the beach.

entry.title: The Strand at Night
entry.content: Looking north on the Strand at 26th Street, in front of one of the oldest homes in Hermosa Beach (~1920).
entry.summary: Looking north on the Strand at 26th Street, in front of one of the oldest homes in Hermosa Beach (~1920).

entry.title: Last Light on 26th St.
entry.content:
Last light, looking north at Santa Monica from 26th St. in Hermosa Beach.

Long exposure with very little light in the sky; plus I waved my iPhone flashlight at the lifeguard tower during the exposure :-)
entry.summary: Last light, looking north at Santa Monica from 26th St. in Hermosa Beach.

entry.content: Watching the sun set at the Hermosa Beach Pier this evening.
entry.summary: Watching the sun set at the Hermosa Beach Pier this evening.
